title: Stabilizing LiCoO2 at 4.6 V by regulating anti-oxidative solvents
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02049A, Paper
Hengyu Ren, Guorui Zheng, Yuhang Li, Shiming Chen, Xiaohu Wang, Mingzheng Zhang, Wenguang Zhao, Haocong Yi, Weiyuan Huang, Jianjun Fang, Tongchao Liu, Luyi Yang, Ming Liu, Qinghe Zhao, Feng Pan
By anti-oxidative electrolyte solvent regulation, we effectively regulated the reaction path of PF6− anions in the Helmholtz plane of the LCO/electrolyte interface at 4.6 V, forming a robust CEI and retaining layered structure of LCO with cycling.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
